thread.section_title: HDIS Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HDIS | www.hdis.com | 2 of 116
thread.title: Chris

author: Chris
title: Chris
text: I didn't realize how much having overnight protection would mean to me but I'm so happy I found HDIS. I tried the small sample pack first and really loved the underwear I ordered. I am a plus size person and the XL in the Maximum Overnight fit perfect and didn't leak. I also have tried Always Maximum overnight and they leaked a little. I now have a terrible cold and the coughing and sneezing cause a lot of leakage so am wearing the Always underwear during the day some times. Always is much cheaper but the Reassure are the best and I won't stop using them at all. Thank you HDIS for making me comfortable again.
